N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2052.5 - Board approval for personal service contracts

State Regulations

All personal service contracts involving services to be
rendered over more than 12 months shall be approved in advance by the board of
directors, and performance under such contracts shall be reviewed annually by
the board of directors. In addition, any personal service contract shall be
approved by the board of directors if the personal service contract is likely
to result in total payments to the outside contractor in excess of $50,000 per
year and is not in the ordinary course of the corporation's business of
maintaining, managing and operating the properties of the
corporation. Notes
